title: Blue essence not recieved?
body: Ok so i logged in on a computer and i had a stationary 35k blue essence as its now pre season. I then got a notification saying ''you just got 88k blue essence'' as a reward thingy, but i didnt get anything at all, it showed a notification of claim and all that but i havent gained a singel thing. Why?

replies.body: You need to complete a mission by playing a game to acquire those Blue Essence, even one bot game will do, view your mission tab for more details.
it should be an "unlockable" in your Loot. you just need to open it.
heres the thing... its not in my loot.
Look in your mission tabs. Once you've won a game (or whatever the requirement was) it will go to your loot to unlock (as BarryButcher mentioned above).
